solution_line_template: If the number of green houses is three times the number of yellow houses, and there are {green_houses} green houses, then there are {green_houses}/{green_yellow_multiplier} = {yellow_houses} yellow houses.

She also has {yellow_house_difference} fewer yellow houses than blue houses, meaning there are {yellow_houses}+{yellow_house_difference} = <<{yellow_houses}+{yellow_house_difference}={blue_houses}>>{blue_houses} blue houses.
The number of houses that are not yellow is {blue_houses} blue houses +{green_houses} green houses = <<{blue_houses}+{green_houses}={houses_not_yellow}>>{houses_not_yellow}
